definition: Wow!/sound of child's crying/sound of vomiting
replaces 啊[a5] when following the vowel "u" or "ao"
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
(old) jade tablet (a ceremonial badge of rank)
variant of 卡哇伊[ka3 wa1 yi1]
(lit.) I cry!/Oh, bosh!/Shoot!/(from Taiwanese 我哭, Tai-lo pr. [goá khàu])
Sumbawa, Indonesian island east of Java

sentences.english: That was so cool! Hey, Dad, did you see that?
sentences.chinese: 哇，好好玩啦嘿，爸爸看到没有？

sentences.english: Wow he send weapons to the enemy who beheads Christians.
sentences.chinese: 哇他竟然给斩杀基督徒的敌人运送武器。

sentences.english: Heckles?Wow, Heckles was voted class clown, and so was I.
sentences.chinese: 哇，Heckles被评为班里的开心果，我也是。

sentences.english: Wow- you reficisly live in the Stone Age.
sentences.chinese: 哇，你真的还生活在石器时代。

sentences.english: Wow, quite a few. What was good in these museums?
sentences.chinese: 哇，真不少。这些博物馆中有些什么呀？

sentences.english: Shoot! My coat is caught in the door.
Wow. From the ocean, just like you, Gill.
sentences.chinese: 哇，来自大海，吉哥跟你一样呢。

sentences.english: B: Wow, you really showed off today.
sentences.chinese: 哇，你今天可真出了风头了。

sentences.english: Penny : Oh, my god, this is the best cobbler I've ever had.
sentences.chinese: 哇，这是我吃过最好吃的厚皮馅饼。

sentences.english: Wow, I gotta go, look at the time.
They supply cheap wow power leveling service to loyal and reliable customers.
sentences.chinese: 哇，他们提供廉价电力调配服务忠诚可靠的客户。

sentences.english: Boy, it's marvelous. I prefer Neijia to Waijia. Well, who's the forefather of Neijia then?
sentences.chinese: 哇，内家功夫真是神了，我喜欢。谁是它的开山鼻祖？

sentences.english: Woah, I didn't think Cameron would go that far.
sentences.chinese: 哇哦，我真的没有想到卡梅隆会这么做。

definition: interjection of wonder, shock or admiration
(particle equivalent to 啊 after a vowel, expressing surprise or doubt)
interjection or grunt of agreement/uhm/Ah, OK/expression of recognition/Oh, it's you!
modal particle ending sentence, showing affirmation, approval, or consent
interjection expressing doubt or requiring answer/Eh?/what?
interjection of surprise or doubt/Eh?/My!/what's up?
sentence-final particle (abbr. for 呢啊[ne5 a5] or variant of 哪[na5])
hey!/(interjection used to attract attention or to express surprise or disapprobation)
(interjection of surprise, pain, annoyance etc)/Oh my!/Uh-oh!/Ah!/Ouch!
